item.description: 3 years ago, One of Myrrdin’s closest friends Therapydd, set off on his own A’lawdrinaieth leaving off of The Forlorn Shiver never to be seen again.

Myrrdin’s uncle Nikephoros completed his own A’lawdrinaieth nearly 12 years ago by scaling the sheer cliffs that line the edge of the The Forlorn Shiver until he reached the very bottom, scraping against sky itself.
Myrrdin and Therapydd (His friend that disappeared 3 years ago on his A’lawdrinaieth) were close friends for all though their childhood.
Hariotte Sparding asked us to travel to the Knuckle Mountains in order to retake the Sparding Family Castle from the undead.
One of the Dwarves we met at the Boney Mire asked us to help recover their iron mine in the Mountains to the North.
Myrrdin learned a little from the crew of the airship that he landed on. The human empire lives on a far away shard known has Hearthen.
In Progress 1 2 3 LIST FROM #quests/in-progress SORT file.mtime DESCENDING To Do 1 2 3 LIST FROM #quests/todo SORT file.
We were tasked by a member of the wineforth family to retake the Wineforth Estate. The Wineforth Family is quite wealthy.
